text.0: The second wave of #Covid19 is here, and along with it, a mutation of the coronavirus. How will this mutation in virus affect the efficacy of the new vaccine and how prepared is Nigeria for the second wave? Read here to get all the facts: https://t.co/pDlzMAQ3rl #DubawaChecks
text.1: A viral video was shared on Twitter with the claim that Boko Haram released a video of its fighters capturing and beheading Nigerian soldiers. However, the claim is misleading as the video has been on the internet since 2019. Read here: https://t.co/hCmHEl8EiP #DubawaChecks
text.2: What is the Moderna vaccine? And how true is the claim that it is 100% effective against severe #Covid19 infection? Read the facts here:https://t.co/J7rQLPhkJU #DubawaChecks
text.3: Content analysis of fact-check of claims on the  #EndSARS protest identified images as the most manipulated contents. It also showed Twitter as the most dominant platform. Read more here: https://t.co/FCrU7CHooC #DubawaChecks
